name: Mercedes-Benz C-Class
description: The price of Mercedes-Benz C-Class, a 5 seater Sedan, ranges from Rs. 60.85  - 62.70 Lakh. It is available in 3 variants, with engine options ranging from 1496 to 1993 cc and a choice of 1 transmission: Automatic. C-Class comes with 7 airbags. Mercedes-Benz C-Class is available in 6 colours. Users have reported a mileage of 17.5 kmpl for C-Class.

variants.variant_name: C-Class C 200 1496 cc, Petrol, Automatic (TC), 201 bhp
C-Class C 220d 1993 cc, Diesel, Automatic (TC), 197 bhp
C-Class C 300d 1993 cc, Diesel, Automatic (TC), 261 bhp
